member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.SfDataGridToExcelConverter
member.summary: Provides the base implementation to export the SfDataGrid to Excel.
member.remarks: It provides the set of public and virtual methods to customize the rows and columns of ExcelSheet.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.SfDataGridToExcelConverter.ExcelRowIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the row index of ExcelSheet which keeps track of the excel row index while exporting.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.SfDataGridToExcelConverter.ExcelColumnIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the column index of ExcelSheet which keeps track of the excel column index while exporting.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.GridExcelExportExtension.ExportCollectionToExcel(Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.SfDataGrid,Syncfusion.Data.ICollectionViewAdv,Syncfusion.XlsIO.ExcelVersion)
member.summary: Exports the dataGrid to excel.
Exports the dataGrid to excel by considering Grouping,Sorting,Filtering,Summaries,Paging,NestedGrid,CellTypes,Unbound rows, Merged cells and Stacked headers.
member.param: Specifies the delegate handler which is used to customize the styles for Header, Table Summary, Group Summary and Caption Summary rows.
Specifies the delegate handler which is used to customize the exporting of Details View.
Specify whether need to export all the pages or not.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions
member.summary: Class which is used to set the exporting options. User can pass the instance of this class as an argument to the ExportToExcel method.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExcludeColumns
member.summary: list of columns that should be excluded while exporting

member.summary: Gets or sets CoeveredCells while exporting

member.summary: Gets list of columns which includes excluding of ExcludeColumns.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions.AllowOutlining
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the groups should export with expand/collapse options or not. There is no indent space maintained if AllowOutlining is set to true. If the grid contains the Details View definition, the AllowOutlining is set to true internally.
member.value: true if Outlining is enabled; otherwise, false.The default value is true.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions.CellsExportingEventHandler
member.summary: Gets or sets the value which is used to handle or customize the exporting of a particular cell in Excel.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions.ChildExportingEventHandler
member.summary: Gets or sets the value which is used to customize the exporting of Details View.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExcelVersion
member.summary: Gets or sets the value which specifies workbook version
member.value: One of the enumeration that specifies the excel version. The default mode is .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExportAllPages
member.summary: Gets or sets the value which specifies whether all pages should be exported for PagedCollection.By default, only current page will be exported
member.value: true if all pages should be exported; otherwise, false.The default value is false.
member.remarks: This option is not supported with OnDemandPaging.

member.summary: Gets or sets the value which is used to customize the styles for Header, Table Summary, Group Summary and Caption Summary rows.

member.summary: Gets or sets the value which specifies start row index in Excel.

member.summary: Gets or sets the value which specifies how paged collection should be exported to excel
member.value: One of the enumeration that specifies the ExportPageOptions. The default mode is .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExportMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the value which specifies how the data should be exported to excel
member.value: One of the enumeration that specifies the ExportMode. The default mode is .

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExportStackedHeaders
member.summary: Gets or sets the value which indicates whether stacked headers should be exported or not
member.value: true if StackedHeaders should be exported; otherwise, false.The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions.ExportUnBoundRows
member.summary: Gets or sets the value which indicates whether the UnBoundRows should be exported or not
member.value: true if UnBoundRows should be exported; otherwise, false.The default value is false.

member.summary: list of columns that should be excluded while exporting

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TreeGrid.Converter.TreeGridExcelExportingOptions.IsGridLinesVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the export with grid line in worksheet or not.
member.value: true if the user can set the grid lines visible to excel sheet; otherwise,false the default width is set to the excel sheet. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TreeGrid.Converter.TreeGridExcelExportingOptions.AllowOutliningGroups
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the nodes should export with outlines or groups to denote the its level.
member.value: true if the user can group the record based on the node level; Otherwisefalse. The default value is true.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TreeGrid.Converter.TreeGridExcelExportingOptions.AllowIndentColumn
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the nodes should export with indent to denote it level.
member.value: true if the user can add the indent column based on the node level; otherwise, false. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TreeGrid.Converter.TreeGridExcelExportingOptions.Columns
member.summary: Gets list of columns to export by excluding of ExcludeColumns.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.TreeGrid.Converter.TreeGridExcelExportingOptions.ExportColumnWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the export with treeGridColumnWidth or defaultColumnWidth.
member.value: true if the user can set the treegrid column width to excel sheet; otherwise,false the default width is set to the excel sheet. The default value is true.
